Data: One issue that i have is with connectivity between my phone and device. Sometimes the floors climbed are not accurate, it would be nice if the phone counted as well as the device. other than that issue i think the app is great
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the app to count accurate floor climbed data so that I can see actual exercise information and track my fitness.

Data: The sleep app shows the most recent nights sleep on the dashboard display, but when you click on the details in will only show you the night prior and not the most recent night. Should be a simple update.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want to see recent nights sleeping data in "details screen" so that I can observe and analyze my sleep pattern (just like it is shown on dashboard).

Data: Doesn't allow integration to other services like Strava. I will have to return my Watch GT if I can't at the very least manually export my activities. Otherwise good app. Syncs some activities to Google Fit, but misses most of the data.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health End User, I want to have the integration option with Strava app so that I can see data of my activites which was recorded in strava.

Data: What's the point of tracking every thing about your health if you CAN'T SET A CALORIE GOAL TO GO WITH YOUR FOOD INTAKE. HOW STUPID IS THIS?????
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want to have the option to setup Calorie Goal for individual Food Consumption so that I can see which food I should consume to meet my calorie goal.

Data: A very good app to use it with my SmartWatch but I would recommend to have more options and do further improvements for better use. And a variety of watch faces would be far greater because that is what consumers care about the most, how it looks.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health End User, I want to have more watch faces so that I can try out other watch faces and their looks.

Data: Getting better and faster ... Keep it up.   Adding 7 minutes workout kind of activities with sample will be great feature.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want to have 7 minutes workout activity in the app so that I can quickly finish activity and see the workout result.

Data: The app doesn't allow for  Bluetooth connection between my FR 235 and Huawei P10, no amount of resetting and restarting of devices help.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the app to connect with Bluetooth devices properly so that I can connect with my other devices.

Data: Garmin completely broke sync as of the latest update, this is garbage. Don't buy their devices, giant waste of your time.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the app to work properly after the latest update so that I can use the app without any hassle.

Data: Used to have no problems syncing with my Samsung Note5, as it worked fine for 2 months, and then stopped syncing.  There were connection problems prior to the absolute complete failure to sync. Now very sad.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the app to sync with my Samsung Note 5 so that I can use the app without any hassle.

Data: ƒ∞ have trouble to connect my mi band 5 to samsung health and it make unsatisfied to use this app
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health User, I want the app to sync with my MI band 5 so that I can use the app without any hassle.

Data: I'm withholding one star until you make a widget for Android. Consider it a hostage situation and chop chop!  :-)
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want to see app as a widget in the android platform so that I can easily drag in the home screen and use it.

Data: I have the body fat scale but I only get the weigth and body fat, where are the other 9 measures
Human_Written_Stories: As a user of the body fat scale app, I want to see all the health metrics the scale claims to measure (like muscle mass, water percentage, visceral fat, etc.), not just weight and body fat, so that I can get a complete understanding of my body composition as advertised.

Data: Quite good but lacking in some areas. Sleep tracking is particularly bad, as a poor sleeper I was hoping this function would be useful but it tells me I've had 8 hours solid sleep when I definitely haven't. Could learn a lot from FitBit's algorithm.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the app to record and track my sleeping so that I can see my sleeping data and try to improve my sleeping pattern.

Data: Generally good but Body Battery and Stress tabs don't work during some activities, for example Hiking, which renders the features practically useless for anyone who does it often :/
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the Body Battery and Stress Tabs to work perfectly during all activities so that I can see insights on them.

Data: I work a 12 hr shift and i walk 10 of those hours.  This doesn't count all of my steps. Not happy about the way it shows your rewards. Won't let you see each reward. Before update was better. Not excited about using this anymore.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health User, I want the app to count my steps during my working shift so that I can keep track of my steps.

Data: I have nexus 6p it always disconnect from my phone Bluetooth. After 15 min my watch tells me to reconnect such a bad software .
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want the app to connect with my Nexus 6p without error so that I can continue to use it on my watch.

Data: Please make the app working in other devices too. It asks for latest version of Huawei mobile services. We can't buy a separate mobile to make the app work. So please make it working
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want to use it on different version of different android mobile.

Data: After updating to the app, I can't disable the Continuous Heart Rate Monitor feature of my Honor Watch. It enable itself every time I tried to disable it. ** With the latest update, the problem now is solved. Thanks Huawei
Human_Written_Stories: As a user of the Honor Watch app, I want to be able to disable the Continuous Heart Rate Monitor feature and have my setting persist, so that I can control my device’s behavior according to my preferences and save battery life.

Data: Not able to open the app. Use to work but not anymore. I reinstalled the app but still not opening
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health User, I want the app to work on my device without any error so that I can use it on my device.

Data: It is a really good app, but when I changed my phone device, I lost everything (my progress, my food, my steps...) even when I have an account linked to this app.  I would have given 5 stars if this didn't happen. What a pity.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health User, I want the app to sync my data to any device where I will login using same account so that I can my progress, my food, my steps on the logged in devices.

Data: overall, the app gives me all the data I need. but lately, I have been experiencing hanging and crashing upon opening. please resolve this issue. thanks now, it can not record my activity if I am not connected to the internet..
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health User, I want the app to work on my device without hanging device or crashing the app so that I can use the app smoothly.

Data: It now requires an upgrade to Huawei Mobile which is not available in my country of Japan. So my Huawei Watch cannot be used with my Huawei phone. Joke of a company
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Watch user in Japan, I want to use my watch without being forced to upgrade to Huawei Mobile Services, especially when the upgrade isn’t available in my country, so that I can continue using my Huawei Watch with my Huawei phone without unnecessary restrictions.

Data: I am unable to use notifications features from last update although I have followed all instructions and troubleshooting suggested by app. Bad experience
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health User, I want to update the app smoothly so that I can get the notification.

Data: You cannot enter your weight manually....only thru a high tech Huawei weigth monitor...$$$ plus where do you buy that??? Not in Mexico....so very useless app
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health End User, I want to have the option to enter weight manually so that I do not need additional devices to connect.

Data: I enjoy the app, especially logging food. Would be nice if app would allow more than 100 My Food entries to be added/created.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want to have the option to include more than 100 food consumption data so that I can see more food consumtion data.

Data: Would be 5 stars, but you can't see the training programmes that you're currently doing, it only offers you to start new ones. I have to log in on a browser to see my training session each day.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Garmin Connect User, I want to see my ongoing training in the dashboard so that I can quickly see my progress.

Data: It was great for tracking steps but now the step counter isn't resetting each day. It doesn't work. Update: Samsung responded very quickly for a fix to the problem and it was able to resolve the issue and now it works better.
Human_Written_Stories: As a user of the step tracking feature, I want the step counter to reset automatically each day, so that I can accurately track my daily activity and progress.

Data: Wish my health data could be accessed from a computer, not just on my mobile phone. Laptop screen would be larger, showing more data at the same time, easier to print reports, maybe also compare data over different time frames etc.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want to have the option to see my health data on desktop web browser so that I can see more data in a big screen and print reports and compare data over different time frames.

Data: Was working fine until I got a new phone but now my band 4 pro won't pair with the app. Sort it out
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health User, I want the app to connect with my band 4 pro without error so that I can continue to use it on that device.

Data: Loved this app for a long time. But the recent updatehas killed it for me.beacause this app all of sudden need permission for access my contacts and all. A big No from my side.i already had uninstall this app.Now searching for better pedometer..
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want the app not to access my contacts so that my contacts data keep secured and private.

Data: Where did it go? The app is nowhere to be found on my phone! I have to go to the play store and search it JUST to access it outside of my watch. Its really hard tk travk and compare when you cant find the dang thing!
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want to have the option to keep the app on homescreen of my phone after installation so that I can easily find the app and use it.

Data: If your heart rate is too high, like after a good cardio sesh it wont give a bpm, which is ridiculous, just tell me how fast its going, damn.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health User, I want the app to show me the BPM after each cardio so that I can keep track of how fast my heart is beating.

Data: App is great. But please address the average pace. The average pace is still calculated in imperial even though we have set it to metric.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health End User, I want to have the option to see measurements unit of average pace in metric measurements system so that I can easily recognise and measure them.

Data: Its great to use! The only thing i could say is, you need to update the list of food on it! Like new flavours of chips or drinks! :)
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want to see more food category added in the  food list so that I can see new flavours of chips or drinks.

Data: Needs a notification to tell you when it has picked up a gps signal. I run the same route but I can can have a difference of 0.1 to 0.4 due to not knowing when It the app has a gps lock like.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Samsung Health End User, I want to see to have the option to pickup my gps signal so that I can see the difference between previous and present location.

Data: Heart rate and sleep data does not upload to Google Fit for Honor Band 5, even though both apps show each other and data sharing is turned on. Within the Huwawei Health app, sleep data always has to be manually synchronised. Heart rate is recorded fine though.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health User, I want to have the option to upload heart and sleeping data to Google Fit for Honor Band 5 so that I can see data from Google Fit.

Data: For the love of God why won't they fix the height and weight glitch in the profile settings?!! No matter what I do is defaults to 14 feet tall and 65 pounds!! This cannot be hard for them to fix!!! Obviously they don't care.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health User, I want to see responsive profile setting page so that I can see ratio based profile on different devices.

Data: Same story... does not work completely. Does it only work on overpriced Samsung Phones. I regret that I still have a Samsung smartwatch. Just loading circle all the time.

Data: would be amazing if a feature/switch were added so that newly installed apps didn't automatically send smart notifications from the get-go. otherwise a good app, its just that one flaw.

Data: Doesn't always record the correct number of steps. For me averages 1/2 what was actually done. Have to uninstall and re install to get it correct for a little while.

Data: Spent 3 days unsuccessfully trying to pair with my Android phone and then it just connected no problem. A bit annoying but other than that a good app.

Data: Terrible decision to limit monthly challenge to that 200k limit. What a joke. Please fire the idiot who made that decision.

Data: hi, i like the app but i feel it's missing a bar scanner for the food part, like My Fitness does.

Data: there is no option in app for chane watch face style! i think u're limit some of option for some countries, and that is not fair! i Use the best model of huawei phone and smart watch but i can't use applicatins completely :(

Data: I am using huawei gt 2 This app has sooo disappointing watch faces.without any custom for faces.And it looks so poor and not in 3d model at all.samsung has more features and more customs for their watches and i have a bit of shame on you huawei

Data: Clearly structured and intuitive app. The transfer/sync of my rowing erg sessions to the adidas app doesn't work though. As soon as this will work, the app is worth 5 stars to me.

Data: Only uses bluetooth, which is great if you own a vivoactive but not so great if you own a forerunner 910xt

Data: Sleep data ok on watch but not logging on health app still, even after update too current version ending 331, not worked all this year . App will record naps ok now, Still not sorted .

Data: Can't use my Fitbit. Any time I'm typing using the keyboard, phone defaults to home screen. Have to push everything 3 times to get a reaction. Not impressed. This is my 3rd Huawei, it will be the last.

Data: Tool a 8 hike mile this app showed less than 3 miles. Reinstalled app now seem to be working correctly.

Data: Great app. I would like to see more variety in the badges. Can be abit repetitive and also very few new ones added outside or the monthly challenges

Data: Great app with lots of data! My only concern is the time it takes to update the app from my watch.

Data: I wish there was a weight lifting option to choose in the workout section. I have a honor band 5i.

Data: More than half the app in Chinese even though I selected English unistalled and reinstalled and still the same. Not helpful at all.

Data: Km count is totally wrong-where in reality I have 15 m,app counted 2 km!!  Pedometer too not trustable,walked with friend the same amount-very long  distance,I had ~12000 steps, she - 30000. At the end of the walk different  notifications about different length.

Data: Latest update does not show calories burned.  Could be 4 or 5 stars with just a few tweaks.  I do love the heart rate chart and other detailed workout info though.

Data: Can't rest my password asking everytime old password trying rest my password is not possible why u guys are so sick. To make app for coustomer convince not for ur own First change these type of idiot things from app

Data: Great app continuously improving. only thing I'd change is to have more training programs available for different distances, but I expect that's coming soon.

Data: I have to verify my phone number at least every other day, even though I use it very regularly. That is extremely annoying. Other than that I mostly like the app.

Data: I've just bought vivofit 2 and the watch works great with the heart rate strap as I can see when I'm maxing out etc. BUT the heart rates/activities will not sync with the app. All I get is steps and calories burned. Help!!

Data: Please let us connect to VeryFitPro app. Bought an affordable smart watch and want to be able to connect them. Please!

Data: My vivosmart hr stopped syncing data with this update (even though it's clearly connecting). I advise against downloading until this is resolved.

Data: A very handy app but occasionally it's slow to connect to my device.  I recently changed from a Nokia mobile phone which is not fully supported to an android device which is. I recommend this app.

Data: Great app, means this huawei is trying best to keep customer satisfied, every week they are updating 3 to 6 watch faces means it's awesome ‚ù§Ô∏è. I really love the way they are making beautiful watch faces and i hope that huawei will continue updating watch faces and new features

Human_Written_Stories: As a user experiencing constant app crashes despite updates and reinstalls, I want to receive reliable support and a clear way to contact the development team, so that my issue can be resolved effectively, especially since the call center was unable to help.

Data: One more update. Find a way to give steps for cyclists. There's no way people do hundreds of thousands of steps everyday. It seems dishonest that I don't want to be part of it.. uninstalling..btw the GPS seems to be working fine now.
Human_Written_Stories: As a cyclist using the app, I want a more accurate way to log my activity instead of converting cycling into unrealistic step counts, so that the data reflects my actual effort and feels honest and meaningful.

Data: I used to love this app.. now it dosent even work properly. It dosent even count my steps sometime.. really frustrating, also weight management feature is no longer there with the new update.. pointless having this app anymore..
Human_Written_Stories: As a long-time user of the app, I want the step counter to work reliably and the weight management feature to remain available, so that I can continue using the app to track my fitness as I used to, without losing essential functionality or facing unreliable performance.

Data: Horrible app. Doesn't count the steps & the distance in minutes properly at  all. Very very bad app. Needs immediate rectification.
Human_Written_Stories: As a Huawei Health End User,  I want the app to be more accurate in calculating steps and distance during activities so that I can see actual data, not made up data.

Data: I have a bug. I connected the application to MyFitnessPal. After  synchronisation I have a few hundred thousands of calories burnt in  MyFitnessPal.
Human_Written_Stories: As a user syncing this app with MyFitnessPal, I want the calorie data to sync accurately without inflating the numbers, so that I can trust my calorie tracking and avoid incorrect data like hundreds of thousands of calories burned.
